Case: Where such facility is maintained by employer and is not available uniformly to all employees
Taxable Value: Notional cost of such facility. ( Value at which such facility is offered to general public )

Case: where the employee is on official tour and the expenses are incurrred in respect of any members of his household accompanying him
Taxable Value: The amount of expenditure so incurred for the accompanying member of his household

Case: Where an official tour is extended as a vacation
Taxable Value: The value will be limited to the expenses incurred in relation to such extended period of stay or vacation
